DataElement.preferredName: Central Reviewer Recurrent Progressive Disease Diagnostic Scan Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text to allow the critically evaluating reviewer to describe additional information pertinent to worsening disease or return of disease after remission that was identified on the data or image sensing device.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Central Reviewer Recurrent Disease Progressive Disease Diagnostic Scan
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A single person who critically evaluates and reports on laboratory test results, protocols, or other data._The return of a disease after a period of remission._Cancer that is increasing in scope or severity._Characteristic or indicative of a condition._The data or image obtained by gathering information with a sensing device.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A single person who critically evaluates and reports on laboratory test results, protocols, or other data.

Concepts.definition: A single person who critically evaluates and reports on laboratory test results, protocols, or other data.

Property.preferredName: Recurrent Disease Progressive Disease Diagnostic Scan
Property.preferredDefinition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.:Cancer that is increasing in scope or severity.:Characteristic or indicative of a condition.:The data or image obtained by gathering information with a sensing device.

Concepts.definition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.
A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.
Characteristic or indicative of a condition.
The data or image obtained by gathering information with a sensing device.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
